title: 1br/1ba $1325/ 675sq
map_address: 2426 N Sawyer Ave Apt 2w near Fullerton/Kedzie
posting_body: Very Large apartment, especially for the area.
In the bedroom I have a king bed, chair, and dresser and still have room.
Walk in closet.
Antique fireplace.
Heaters in every room.
Large living room and other room.
Has a smaller kitchen.
Beautiful court yard.
Walls are built strong and you can’t hear any neighbors not that any are loud to begin with.
On streets parking always available.
The area itself is amazing, blue line right up the block along with tons of restaurants, cafe, farmers market, entertainment, Logan Square park.
ON site laundry.
Apartment has storage closet and additional personal-storage area in the laundry area.
In the pictures the living area may look small but I bought a huge couch.
Also on the second floor and the apartment gets tons of natural light and there is a tree out the window which is nice and view of courtyard which is well kept.
No issues with water/gas or anything.
Dogs/Cats allowed.
This a sublet, lease will expire March 31st, 2023.
LOOKING FOR Aug. 1st.
or sooner move in  This apartment is kinda a steal for the price, size, and location.
There is a relet option, but will be more expensive@ 1550.
Text/call me @ 720-544-9363.
I have a crazy work schedule and my phone isn’t allowed but I will respond when I can.
I’m will to show the apartment, but like I said my schedule is wild, I’m willing to face time to show you it, than we can set something up in person.
Or if the schedule works just in person.
Unfurnished.
No move in fee, just application
